title: Chocolate chocolate banana tart
ingredients: ['For the chocolate shortcrust', '170g plain flour', '1 1/2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '110g butter, melted', '1 tablespoon water, or as needed', 'For the filling', '200ml whipping cream', '200g plain chocolate, cut into small pieces', '2 or 3 bananas, sliced']
